Project Overview.Business Intent: To create a next-generation e-commerce platform for artisans.
Project Overview.Requirements: The platform must support multi-vendor-management, secure payments, and a recommendation engine.

User Stories.description: As a new user, I want to create an account using my email and password so I can access the platform.
As an existing user, I want to log in to my account.
As a user, I want to pay with my credit card securely.

Business Rules: All passwords must be a minimum of 10 characters.
Shipping is only available within the United States.
A commission of 15% is taken from all artisan sales.
UI UX guidelines: The platform must adhere to Material Design principles, with a color palette focused on earth tones. Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) is a top priority.
